name: Turbulent Soul
description:
[Note before playing; Make sure to hit the Fullscreen button in the bottom right corner to get the full UI and experience.]

A violent tornado has taken your life. 

Yet you're still here.  And so is the tornado??

Have you really died? If so, why can't you get out of this cyclone? And who is this voice rattling on in your head? Turns out the journey to the afterlife is stranger than you could have guessed.

Avoid possessed objects that will pull you down with them. Collect "floaty" objects and save lost spirits to increase your Levity and escape the tornado! Uncover multiple endings in this relentless and dizzying little action-puzzler!

Development Note:
Thanks for checking out my game here! This is my first game that I've released publicly and is part of the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam. Let me know what you think!
